Docs.summary: Controls for how a thread will be truncated prior to the run. Use this to control the initial context window of the run.

MemberSignature.Value: public Truncation (Azure.AI.Agents.Persistent.TruncationStrategy type);

Docs.param: The truncation strategy to use for the thread. The default is `auto`. If set to `last_messages`, the thread will be truncated to the `lastMessages` count most recent messages in the thread. When set to `auto`, messages in the middle of the thread will be dropped to fit the context length of the model, `max_prompt_tokens`.

Docs.summary: The truncation strategy to use for the thread. The default is `auto`. If set to `last_messages`, the thread will be truncated to the `lastMessages` count most recent messages in the thread.
